author: dblevins
msg: Fixed the handler not to marshal arguments when the list is a zero length array

author: dblevins
msg: Converted the jsp-basedtools from the tomcat integration into HttpBeans

author: dblevins
msg: Changed the creation of the left navbar so that any bean in the JNDI namespace is displayed
on the left side.  The dark blue part is the JNDI Context name and the subsections in
light blue are the HttpBeans in the context.
This makes it possible to group beans into units and display them as units.

author: dblevins
msg: Changed the webadmin template to use the logo with the drop shadow.  Also to
give more realestate to the screen.

author: dblevins
msg: Moved the EjbGen into it's own jar and section in the webadmin
